title: RIOT IVE BEEN PERMA BANNED FOR NO REASON PLEASE HELP
body: I haven't logged in in about a month or so I patch up try to get in and it says im perma  suspended??? I have 100's of dollars and hours in this game I'm NOT a cheater look at my match history and rank please help me I dint get an email or anything else I'm freaking out right now I've had this game for almost 4 years please help me get my account back

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you, don't worry!  Your account was not suspended, but we did apply a security lock due to some suspicious activity.  I recommend going over our[ account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to secure your info, and fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help restore access.
Did someone borrow your account or you getting hacked?
